#BePartOfSomethingSpecial

Press and media

Would you like assets for a news article or website feature? Maybe an interview with one of our team?

Our experienced and dedicated press and media team are based out of offices in London and are happy to fulfil your press and media requests. We know what an important role the media plays and we love working with writers, publishers and media outlets, so please don’t hesitate to get in touch.

Here’s a list of some of things our press and media team can support you with

  • High-resolution logos in multiple formats
  • High resolution artwork in multiple formats
  • Videos and GIFs
  • Company statements and thought leadership
  • Co-marketing opportunities
  • Requests for promotion on our channels
  • Marketing and PR opportunities you’d like to propose to us
  • Community engagement
  • Photoshoots
  • Conference speaking opportunities

Thank you!
Darryl Sparey
Co-founder and CMO
